text: hi my name is Kira and this is the story
of the time I moved 3,000 miles away
from my best friend my mom get a new job
that meant my whole family had to move
all the way from New Jersey to
California that's really far I was
excited to go live in California but I
was also sad cuz I had to leave my
school and my best friend Charlotte
we've been best friends since
kindergarten we've had lots of playdates
sleepovers and once we even went on
vacation together after the move I miss
seeing Charlotte
so one day our parents helped us set up
a video chat now we can see talk to each
other whenever we want you know that
project I was working on how'd you do I
got an A+ I even met her new puppy say
hello to my new puppy a she's so cute
what's her name suu for spring break
shot and her mom flew out to visit this
is a photo of us seeing each other in
person for the very first time since I
moved and this is when I went back East
for summer break and we got to see each
other again new person I made lots of
new friends at my new school but
Charlotte and I have a special
longdistance friendship that will last
forever even though we are 3,000 miles
apart you just watched a TTI on Disney
Channel
